column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I had gone for brunch and enjoyed the omelet.  This week I met a friend for lunch and we both had salads
column2: which were very disappointing.  I ordered  mine with chicken which was soaked in a gooey sauce (just assumed it would be grilled
column3: should have read menu more closely)
column4: my friend added salmon to his
column5: .  The salmon was so over cooked
column6: I actually thought it was a breadstick at first.   He managed to eat it but it was beyond dry and tough.
